UK and France strike a 'pilot deal' on migration as Macron wraps up state visit
subhead: Britain and France announced on Thursday a pilot deal to return some Channel-crossing migrants to France, part of a broader effort to curb dangerous small-boat journeys. The plan has drawn sharp criticism in the UK, with opponents calling it a betrayal of Brexit.

title: US warns ICC member states to drop proceedings against Israel
subhead: Washington has threatened the International Criminal Court with further reprisals if it maintains arrest warrants against Benjamin Netanyahu and former Israeli defense minister Yoav Gallant. The US has already imposed sanctions on five judges and prosecutors.

title: Is it ever a good idea to... wear a speedo on the beach?
subhead: In fashion, as in life, it is important to know the lines you should not cross. Or else, to do so deliberately.

title: In Tunisia, migrants are driven out and their defenders prosecuted
subhead: '2015-2025: Europe's migration crisis' (5/5). For the past two years, the administration of Tunisian President Kais Saied, funded by the European Union, has been pushing sub-Saharan Africans far from cities, sometimes violently, and cracking down on any person or non-profit organization that supports them.
byline: By Julia Pascual (Tunis and Sfax (Tunisia), special correspondent) and Samuel Gratacap (Photos)

title: Spain's Costa Blanca bears the scars of a real estate frenzy
subhead: The region of Valencia in Spain particularly suffered from the real estate frenzy that led to the 2008 financial crisis. Between 2020 and 2021, the Basque photographer Markel Redondo explored this stretch of the Mediterranean coast, which is now rimmed with concrete. His photographs capture the scars that remain from a short-sighted vision of progress.

title: Is the post-coital moment always a sad one?
subhead: Studies have shed light on 'post-coital dysphoria,' which can affect women and – even more frequently – men after sexual intercourse. This condition may manifest in the form of anxiety, sadness or even irritability.
